Controller

Class ReservationController

  • java.lang.Object
    • Controller.ReservationController

  • public class ReservationController
extends java.lang.Object

      • updateReservation

        public static int updateReservation(java.lang.String guestID,
                                    java.lang.String status,
                                    java.time.LocalDate date,
                                    int reservationCode)
                             throws java.io.IOException
        Update Reservation Status of the selected reservation
        Parameters:
        guestID - ID of the guest
        status - Status of the reservation
        date - Current Date
        reservationCode - Code of the reservation
        Returns:
        If it is successfully updated, the method will return 1, else it will return 0
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - throw input/output exception
